reporting-org.narrative: Ministry for Foreign Affairs of Finland

description.narrative: The aim is to employ and make merchant with the producers of arts and crafts and artists in West-Africa so that this business is fair profitable and useful for all involved. The growth to this business comes from web store and retail sale to Finnish Nordic cuntries and Russian arts and crafts shops and their shop chains. In the beginning the products of arts and crafts will start in Leppavirta municipality owned Unnukka center and by own web-store. Unnukka is a well situated and known small shop center by t he highway 5 and has own customers all over Finland. Our boutique will support the the sales products (womens clothes by Aku+Ada Iiittala Outlet and a restaurant) not competing with them. Jewlery decorative objects bags textiles carpets garden furniture mo saice works art instruments and fine arts unique items are mainly directed to buying public whic consists of tourist ladies from Finland and abroad. Later a warehouse for retail sale will be grounded in some suitable central place in Finland.Planning desig n an product devlopement is to be done in co-operatoin with the arts and crafts communities so that these products are desireable in the Nordic countires. The quality criterias also come from these countiries where the sales is taking place. The working en vironments employing facilities and specially women employing is very importnt. Also the companys own employing can be possible but mostly the aim is to buy ready products with fair and relevant prices which keeps everybody involved getting safely and stea dily on.
